extraData.title: Voice-over Showcase
body: Here is the voice-over demo example that Global Voices Media produced for the EU Parliament, "DG Grow", undertaken in 24 different voices.
Just press the play button to listen in English, or select any language below.
extraData.imgTitle: Professional, High Quality and Scalable Audio Solution
